mapper.select: select count(*) from member where M_ID = #{memberId}

select M_ID as memberId , M_PW as memberPw , M_NAME as memberName , M_PHONE as memberPhone , M_EMAIL as memberEmail , M_POST_NUM as memberPostNum , M_ADDRESS1 as memberAddr1 , M_ADDRESS2 as memberAddr2 , M_REG_DATE as memberRegDate , M_AUTHORITY as memberAuthority , M_USER_ACTIVE as memberActive from member where M_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT M.M_NO as memberNo , M.NAME as memberName , C.CON_TITLE as contactTitle , C.CON_CONTENTS as contactContents FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN CONTACT C ON M.MEMBER = C.CONTACT WHERE M.M_NO = #{memberNo}
